SUMMARY: NESTED | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL: FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

mlflex.core
Class Settings

java.lang.Object
  mlflex.core.Settings

public class Settings
extends java.lang.Object

This class stores application wide values. These values are typically machine-specific and are set via command-line parameters.

Author:
Stephen Piccolo

GetOutputExportDir

public static java.lang.String GetOutputExportDir()
                                           throws java.lang.Exception
Depending on the settings for the experiment, this method returns a path to where the export files should be saved.

Returns:
Path to where the export files should be saved
Throws:
java.lang.Exception

GetOutputResultsDir

public static java.lang.String GetOutputResultsDir(java.lang.String subDirectoryPath,
                                                   boolean appendIterationIfMoreThanOne)
                                            throws java.lang.Exception
Depending on the settings for the experiment and the current iteration, this method returns a path to where the results files should be saved.

Parameters:
subDirectoryPath - Sub directory under results
appendIterationIfMoreThanOne - Whether to append the iteration number if more than one iteration is being executed
Returns:
Path to where the results files should be saved
Throws:
java.lang.Exception

                                             throws java.lang.Exception

Parameters:
appendIterationIfMoreThanOne - Whether to append the iteration number if more than one iteration is being executed

NeedToEvaluateInnerFolds

public static boolean NeedToEvaluateInnerFolds()
                                        throws java.lang.Exception
Indicates whether inner cross-validation folds need to be evaluated. In very simple experiments, there is no reason to use inner folds.

Returns:
Whether inner cross-validation folds need to be evaluated.
Throws:
java.lang.Exception
